attributes.action: Support in full the implementation of Energy Performance Certificates on 1st August 2007, and firthermore to support the speedy implementation of EPC for all dwellings by 1st February 2008, which will also include the implementation of EPC's to be required on first day marketing of any property.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to ensure that the government honour it's commitment to the implementation of the "Energy Performance Certificate" on the 1st August 2007, and furthermore ensure its continuing support for full (all dwellings)implementation of EPC's and HIPs by 1st February 2008 which is to also include that all properties will require the said documents on the first day of marketing the property.
